product_name: O'Neill Skins RG8 Crew Rashguard - Women's
long_description: Featuring high recycled content, the women's O'Neill Skins RG8 crew rashguard brings soft, quick-drying comfort to your day on the water. Recycled polyester and elastane fabric dries quickly and feels soft against skin. Slim-fitting design works with your paddle stroke. The women's O'Neill Skins RG8 crew rashguard provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Water-based inks create shirt graphics. Hand wash and drip dry.
short_description: Featuring high recycled content, the women's O'Neill Skins RG8 crew rashguard brings soft, quick-drying comfort to your day on the water.
